mapper.select: select distinct bc.c_name, bc.c_sex, kk.c_tel, bc.c_cardno, kk.zdr_xzdz, kk.zdr_xl, kk.zdr_gzdw, kk.zdr_dwdh, kk.zdr_dwdz, kk.zdr_grsr from kj_icbc bc,kjs_icbc_kk kk where bc.id=kk.icbc_id and bc.id=#{icbc_id}

select bc.*, bc.id, bc.c_name_gj1, bc.c_tel_gj1, bc.c_cardno_gj1, bc.c_name_gj2, bc.c_tel_gj2, bc.c_cardno_gj2, bc.c_cardno, kk.jjlxr_c_name, kk.jjlxr_c_tel, kk.jjlxr_jdrgx, kk.gjr1_yzdrgx, kk.gjr2_yzdrgx from kj_icbc bc, kjs_icbc_kk kk where bc.id=kk.icbc_id and bc.id=#{icbc_id}

select distinct bc.id ,bc.c_name ,kk.dk_price ,kk.gems_code ,kk.aj_date ,kk.icbc_id ,kk.dt_edit ,bc.c_cardno ,bc.loan_tpid ,kk.dk_lv ,kk.dk_total_price ,kk.gjr1_yzdrgx ,kk.gjr2_yzdrgx ,kk.c_tel ,aa.icbc_pricecs ,aa.price_result ,yb.name y_name from kjs_icbc_kk kk, kj_icbc bc, assess_cars aa, yl_banklist yb where kk.icbc_id=bc.id and bc.id=aa.icbc_id and bc.bank_id=yb.id and aa.bc_status=3 and bc.id = #{icbc_id} LIMIT 1

SELECT *, bc.id, bc.c_name, kk.dk_price, kk.dk_total_price, kk.gems_code, aa.icbc_pricecs, kk.aj_date, kk.dt_edit, bc.c_cardno, bc.loan_tpid, kk.dk_lv FROM (SELECT * FROM icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result WHERE STATUS = 61 ORDER BY dt_edit DESC) AS a LEFT JOIN kj_icbc bc ON bc.id=a.icbc_id LEFT JOIN kjs_icbc_kk kk ON kk.icbc_id=a.icbc_id LEFT JOIN assess_cars aa ON aa.icbc_id=a.icbc_id where 1=1
and bc.c_name like '%${param}%' or bc.c_cardno like '%${param}%'
GROUP BY a.qryid ORDER BY a.dt_edit DESC
mapper.insert: insert into loan_repayment_schedule( dt_add, dt_edit, overdue_which, should_date, should_money, icbc_id, c_cardno, c_name ) values( sysdate(), sysdate(), #{overdue_which}, #{should_date}, #{should_money}, #{icbc_id}, #{c_cardno}, #{c_name} )
